sentence: …ALBINO REYES, Carlos: WFDC-TV Univision; Alcindor, Yamiche:       NBC NEWS; Alcock, Shane: AL JAZEERA ENGLISH; Aldag, Jason:       BBC; Alexander, Clinton: CBS NEWS; Alexander, James: WTOP       RADIO; Alexander, Peter: NBC NEWS; Alexander, Robert: WTTG-      FOX TELEVISION; Al Falahi, Mohanad: AL TAGHIER TV; Al Falahi,       Sam: AL TAGHIER TV; Alfarone,…

Mr. FLOOD. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize a pillar of  Nebraska broadcasting, Gary Sadlemyer, who, after nearly five decades  behind the microphone at KFAB News Radio, has officially retired.

Since first stepping into KFAB's studio in 1976, Gary's signature  voice has been trusted by generations of listeners.

From morning news to Nebraska…
